import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick"; import './LazyLoadImage.css' const LazyLoadImage = () => { const fadeImages = [ "images/Slide1.jpeg", "images/Slide2.jpeg", "images/Slide3.jpeg" ]; const settings = { dots: true, focusOnSelect: true, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, speed: 500 }; return ( <>

) } export default LazyLoadImage
